reviewText: I like the quality and sound of these .
I have viewed only four of these so far and have really enjoyed them.  While the shows are very good, the "making of" feature on each is excellent.
Theses are some great movies which I would recommend for everyone. I wish there where more like this out there and at this great price.

We had thoroughly enjoyed watching IMAX at the Denver IMAX theatre, and expected the same type of enjoyment in watching this collection since it was the 50th anniversary edition.  I must say that we were disappointed  in several of these.  Without question, the ones viewed have a distinct environmental theory/presentation which took away from enjoying the incredible beauty of nature, our land.

You get 10 beautiful IMAX films in this collection. Each film is roughly 40 minutes long. The picture and audio quality are great. There are ten separate keepcases with each individual movie (identical to how they would appear if purchased separately). There is over 7 hours of total bonus content.

ARABIA With breathtaking cinematography, go deep into the heart of this exotic land to experience the great mystique of Arabia. Narrated by Helen Mirren. Also includes 3D version!
CORAL REEF ADVENTURE With Jean-Michael Cousteau, deep reef scientist Richard Pyle and Fijian diver Rusi Vulakoro, they explore and capture on film the dazzling underwater world of coral reefs, magical places here on Earth. Narrated by Liam Neeson. Music by Crosby, Stills & Nash.
DOLPHINS Brimming with details about the complex lives of these fascinating animals, this ocean adventure film takes you into the very heart of the world of Dolphins. Narrated by Pierce Brosnan. Music by Sting.
GRAND CANYON ADVENTURE: RIVER AT RISK Join environmental advocates Robert F. Kennedy, Jr. and Wade Davis as they set out with their daughters, traveling deep into the Grand Canyon and down the river that runs through it. Narrated by Robert Redford. Music by Dave Matthews Band.
GREECE: SECRETS OF THE PAST The magic of ancient Greek civilization comes to life in a giant screen adventure! Travel to the dawn of democracy and the birthplace of Western Civilization on a quest to uncover the buried secrets of one of the world's most enlightened societies. Narrated by Nia Vardalos.
HURRICANE ON THE BAYOU Against the poignant backdrop of the most costly natural disaster in America's history, cameras follow a group of four musicians, as they explore the electrifying culture of New Orleans. Narrated by Meryl Streep.
JOURNEY INTO AMAZING CAVES Join Dr. Hazel Barton and Nancy Aulenbach as they travel to unique and forbidding ice caves in Greenland, underwater caves in the Yucatan, terrestrial caves in the Grand Canyon and other spectacular locations. Narrated by Liam Neeson.
THE LIVING SEA The Living Sea takes you to the world's oceans, traveling to Palau, Hawaii, California, Oregon, Alaska, Nova Scotia and the Red Sea. Narrated by Meryl Streep. Music by Sting.
THE MAGIC OF FLIGHT Relive the historical first flight of the Wright Brothers in 1903, then soar with the world-famous Blue Angels as they defy the laws of gravity with their most breathtaking maneuvers. Narrated by Tom Selleck.
MYSTERY OF THE NILE Join a team of explorers on the expedition of a lifetime as they set off to become the first to navigate the Blue Nile from source to sea.

Video Resolution/Codec: 1080p/AVC MPEG-4; 1080p/MVC MPEG-4 (Arabia 3D); 1080p/VC-1 | Aspect Ratio: 1.78:1
Audio Formats: English DTS-HD MA 5.1, French, Spanish
Special Features for Each Film: Making Of Documentary, MacGillivray-Freeman History, Film Trivia Quiz

Buy this Blu-ray collection. This set is less expensive than if you were to purchase each stand-alone Blu-ray.

Of the collection, some of the features are what one would normally expect, chocked full of breath taking footage of amazing things. Unfortunately, a few of the features are less of that ilk and more of the story (ax grinding, really) of some ecological issue or another...
